title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 151-3.10 - Reporting requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 151-3.10 - Reporting requirements

State Regulations

An insurer providing a credit pursuant to this Part shall report annually to the superintendent and the Commissioner of Labor, in a form prescribed by the superintendent, the total number of employers insured during the prior year that received a premium credit for each WSLPIP program, and the total amount of the credit provided by the insurer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
§§
151-3.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
